name: Everyday Life (LotsOfStuff, Sellex, Faunik)
description:
Is your life too exciting?

Ever wondered how "everyday life" actually feels like?

Wait no more.. LotsOfStuff got your back..

Play their new survival game Everyday Life - a new level of boredom!

Keep your happiness high and don't forget to watch the time

Everyday Life was made during minibeansjam 7 - Nicht genug Zeit

LotsOfStuff Team

Tobi- Music, SFX & Gamedesign
Sellex- 3D Art & Gamedesign
David- Programming & Gamedesign

Quellen
